issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I had some capacity for more instances (2 more m1.smalls to be exact) So I launched 2. Only 1 reached running the other terminated, the reason was no more resources. After that, describe AZ shows 0 for capacity, WTF? I restarted the CC and now the correct capacity is shown again.

Suggested cc vmware dance mascot:
!https://s3.amazonaws.com/f.cl.ly/items/2E3U1M3C2p1R2J3l062a/mambo-dancers.jpg!

before running final 2 instances
{code}
[root@b-14 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose
AVAILABILITYZONE	PARTI00	10.111.1.14 arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_14/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0002 / 0004   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0002 / 0004   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0002 / 0004   1    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0001 / 0002   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0001 / 0002   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0001 / 0002   2   1024    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0000 / 0002   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0000 / 0002   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0000 / 0001   4   2048    15
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0000 / 0001   2   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0000 / 0001   4   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000
{code}

After
{code}
[root@b-14 ~]# euca-describe-instances verbose
RESERVATION	r-C0674318	718644112075	default
INSTANCE	i-96FA40C5	emi-19B543BA	euca-10-111-102-22.eucalyptus.b-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-98-170.eucalyptus.internal	running	adminkey	0		m2.2xlarge	2014-02-06T05:19:32.935Z	PARTI00			windows	monitoring-disabled	10.111.102.22	172.31.98.170			ebs					hvm
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sda	vol-18123EDD	2014-02-06T05:19:33.071Z	true
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sdc	vol-69243FB8	2014-02-06T05:26:21.484Z	false
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sdd	vol-661D3946	2014-02-06T05:26:38.976Z	false
TAG	instance	i-96FA40C5	euca:node	10.111.1.68
RESERVATION	r-81F440B6	718644112075	default
INSTANCE	i-66333F74	emi-A77F38E9	euca-10-111-102-24.eucalyptus.b-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-98-169.eucalyptus.internal	running	adminkey	1		m1.small	2014-02-07T17:26:28.083Z	PARTI00	eki-25423648	eri-0CB0362F		monitoring-disabled	10.111.102.24	172.31.98.169			instance-store					paravirtualized
TAG	instance	i-66333F74	euca:node	10.111.1.68
[root@b-14 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose
AVAILABILITYZONE	PARTI00	10.111.1.14 arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_14/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0000 / 0000   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0000 / 0000   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0000 / 0000   1    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0000 / 0000   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0000 / 0000   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0000 / 0000   2   1024    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0000 / 0000   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0000 / 0000   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0000 / 0000   4   2048    15
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0000 / 0000   2   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0000 / 0000   4   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000
{code}

[root@b-14 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose
AVAILABILITYZONE	PARTI00	10.111.1.14 arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_14/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0001 / 0004   1    256     5

comments.body: This ticket relates to VMware. See https://www.eucalyptus.com/eucalyptus-cloud/iaas/compatibility for latest hypervisor compatibility by version.
